product.longDescription: Extend the growing season for cold-hardy crops or overwinter them for earliest possible spring harvest. Quick Hoops Benders are an economical way to create strong low tunnel hoops out of galvanized electrical conduit (EMT) to withstand heavy winds and winter snow loads. The Quick Hoops Bender mounts to any solid surface, such as a workbench or picnic table, or you can mount onto a truck hitch receiver using our optional 9852 Hoop Bender Hitch Mount, for convenience and portability. Creates 4' wide x 4' tall hoops to protect crops when used with row covers; 10–15 ft. widths are recommended. This kit includes one bender and detailed instructions on how to bend your own low tunnel hoops. NOTE: We recommend using ½" conduit, which can be sourced at your local building supply store. Can also be used with 3/4" or 1" conduit, which can be used to provide extra strength for tunnel ends.
product.shortDescription: Create heavy-duty low tunnels that will last for years.

Low Tunnel Hoop Bender – 4' Quick Hoops™

Product ID:9377.09377

Extend the growing season for cold-hardy crops or overwinter them for earliest possible spring harvest. Quick Hoops Benders are an economical way to create strong low tunnel hoops out of galvanized electrical conduit (EMT) to withstand heavy winds and winter snow loads. The Quick Hoops Bender mounts to any solid surface, such as a workbench or picnic table, or you can mount onto a truck hitch receiver using our optional 9852 Hoop Bender Hitch Mount, for convenience and portability. Creates 4' wide x 4' tall hoops to protect crops when used with row covers; 10–15 ft. widths are recommended. This kit includes one bender and detailed instructions on how to bend your own low tunnel hoops. NOTE: We recommend using ½" conduit, which can be sourced at your local building supply store. Can also be used with 3/4" or 1" conduit, which can be used to provide extra strength for tunnel ends.
